name: Chill Galaxy
description:
A space exploration clicker game focuses on "just chilling out", made during Procedural Generation Jam 2016.

It's really just a concept at the moment, the procedural tech involved isn't super advanced neither. But we are interested in testing how fast we can pull components together to create a nice feeling demo. So here it is.

You should be able to figure out your mission in this game soon enough.

Let us know if you have any problems or comments: @bitinn

(For Chinese Readers：游戏附带简体中文翻译，在Options菜单下。)
